text: A unique Necrotect [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero, capable of colonising ruins at level 3, will be summoned to your faction leader.
A Casket of Souls unit will become available for recruitment into any army.
A unique [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero, capable of assassinating without fail, will be summoned to your faction leader.
[[img:icon_effect_treasury]][[/img]]Treasury: +500 for every building owned from the "Buried Treasure" chain.
A Queen Bess unit will become available for recruitment into any army.
An army of Hydra, Black Dragon, Cold One Knight, Medusa, Kharibdyss, Manticore and Scourgerunner Chariot units will spawn at your faction's capital.

A dilemma will offer the choice of each Dark Elf [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero; your choice will be summoned to your faction leader. The rank of the [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero is dependent on the number of settlements [[img:ui/flags/wh2_main_def_naggarond/mon_24.png]][[/img]]Naggarond controls.\\n\\n(Settlements: {{CcoCampaignRitual:CampaignRoot.FactionList.FirstContext(FactionRecordContext.Key == "wh2_main_def_naggarond").SettlementList.Size}})
A unique Plague Priest [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero, capable of spreading a deadly [[img:icon_plague]][[/img]]plague to a foreign settlement, will be summoned to your faction leader.
Restores all units in your armies to full health and immediately returns all wounded and recovering [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords and [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Heroes to the faction.
A dilemma will offer a powerful magical item.
A Black Ark will become available to be recruited from any port settlement.
A dilemma will offer a powerful magical item.
A Slann Mage-Priest will become available for recruitment.
An army of Feral Carnosaur, Stegadon and Bastiladon units will spawn at your faction's capital.

A unique Warlock Engineer [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero, capable of targeting a foreign settlement to either establish an Under-City or cause a catastrophic earthquake there, will be summoned at your faction leader.
A unique Plague Priest [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero, capable of spreading a deadly [[img:icon_plague]][[/img]]plague to a foreign settlement, will be summoned at your faction leader.

A dilemma will allow the dispatch of hunters to secure additional units for your [[img:icon_monster_pens]][[/img]]Monster Pens.\\n\\nPerforming this Rite is free, but your choices may incur additional costs.
Choose from a set of powerful bonuses to your faction\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]Only one bonus can be active at any time[[/col]]
The target army is loaned to you\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]You will lose control of the army if war is declared with the original owner\\n\\nYou cannot target armies led by a faction leader[[/col]]
The target army instantly completes 1 turn of ongoing recruitment
Your faction creates four random magic items or ancillaries
Your faction's armies have their movement ranges restored
The target settlement's garrison is deployed as an army onto the campaign map, however it suffers constant attrition until disbanding

The target settlement (tier 3+ province capital) is declared a Commercial District, gaining improved effects from the settlement building and all Infrastructure and Resource buildings\\n\\n{{tr:matters_of_state_new_tokens_explanation}}\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]A settlement cannot be both a Fortress City and Commercial District[[/col]]
The target army's [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord is granted 5000 experience
The target allied faction's background income is siphoned to your faction for 20 turns
Your faction's diplomatic reliability is reset to Very High, and cannot be reduced this turn
The target settlement's province has its [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]control and all [[img:icon_corruption_untainted]][[/img]]corruption reduced to 0
The target settlement summons an elite Astromancer [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero with a unique trait
The target settlement's buildings instantly swap between their Yin and Yang equivalent where possible
The target settlement instantly completes any ongoing construction

The target settlement (tier 3+ province capital) is declared a Fortress City, gaining improved effects from Military and Defence buildings\\n\\n{{tr:matters_of_state_new_tokens_explanation}}\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]A settlement cannot be both a Fortress City and Commercial District[[/col]]
